## SendableGivety.registerFrontend() method

Register current wallet address as a Givety frontend.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerFrontend(kickbackRate: Decimalish): Promise<SentGivetyTransaction<S, GivetyReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  kickbackRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The portion of GVTY rewards to pass onto users of the frontend (between 0 and 1). |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentGivetyTransaction](./lib-base.sentgivetytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [GivetyReceipt](./lib-base.givetyreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;
